name: Persian
description: One of the most recognizable cat breeds, the Persian has a long, fluffy coat and a flat face.

name: Maine Coon
description: The Maine Coon is a large and muscular domesticated cat breed native to North America.

name: British Shorthair
description: The British Shorthair is a sturdy and compact cat breed originating from the United Kingdom.

name: Sphynx
description: The Sphynx is a breed of hairless cat known for its sleek, wrinkled skin and affectionate nature.

name: Ragdoll
description: The Ragdoll is a large and muscular cat breed known for its soft, silky coat and tendency to go limp when picked up.

name: Siamese
description: The Siamese is a short-haired breed of domestic cat originating from Thailand.

name: Aegean
description: Native to the Greek islands known as the Cyclades in the Aegean Sea, these are natural cats, meaning they developed without humans getting involved in their breeding.
